description:
Turn up the heat on even the speediest of coulors with the Swisswool Piz Badus Jacket for men!

The outer layer of the lightweight insulated jacket is made of quilted, elastic, breathable, and wind-resistant Tec stretch material, while a 70 g/m2 lightweight, functional Swisswool lining on the inside keeps you warm without restricting your freedom of movement. The High-Reach Performance Fit with ergonomic sleeve shape and side inserts made of elastic Merino Fleece ensures an ideal fit for every movement, while the pre-adjusted hood offers additional protection.

The Swisswool Piz Badus Jacket for men also scores highly in terms of sustainability: recycled polyester is used in addition to wool. The insulated jacket is also completely PFC-Free, Climate-Neutral and Made in Europe.

The Swisswool Piz Badus Jacket for men creates an Excellent Weight/Insulation Ratio that really pays off when freeriding just as much as on fresh ski touring summits.
name: Ortovox Swisswool Piz Badus Jacket - Mens

specs.value: 64% Recycled polyester, 30% Virgin Merino Wool, 6% elastane
